medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The pain started as sharp and lasted for 5 minutes before resolving, but it returned 5 minutes later and has been severe ever since. The patient feels uncomfortable in any position. He experienced vomiting twice prior to visiting the ED and currently feels thirsty and a little hungry. He also endorses shortness of breath that correlates with the severity of the pain. Denies fever, chills, abdominal pain, diarrhea, constipation, edema, and recent long car trips.
medical_history.family_history: Parents healthy. No history of blood clots. His mother has a history of nephrolithiasis.
